document_data.name: Grumble
document_data.mainbody: '''Grumble''' was a [[quaggoth]] thonot in [[Maerimydra]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/Assault on Maerimydra|25}}
document_data.Activities: Grumble was a slave overseer there.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], after the initial allied attack on Maerimydra, Grumble was among the minions gathered by the [[shadow demon]] [[Verix]] for the counterattack.
